CONSOLE WARNING: motion is deprecated and will be removed in M58, around April 2017. Please use offset instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/6390764217040896 for more details.
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS motion default is none 0px auto 0deg 
PASS motion supports various angle units 
PASS motion supports SVG path data 
PASS motion property data can be supplied in any order 
PASS motion style can be set inline 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
